document_data.name: Rakiq
document_data.mainbody: '''Rakiq''' was tangy beverage made in [[Fabada]] in the [[High Desert]] of [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: This flavorful drink was made from [[sheep]]'s [[milk]] and [[garlic]].
document_data.History: The [[Numtanajd]] made this drink locally and often gifted it to the [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]] tribes of the High Desert. They would also trade ''rakiq'' for [[coffee]], [[honey]], or salt.
